comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: And there are so many people in Ireland today that would not know what a B Special was much less a "square"!  Mr. Gormley was having a good time knocking a rise out of the dour Mr. Craig.  Interesting that Paul looks more like he under arrest than being escorted for his own safety!

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] Well, I'd say the police were very edgy - There'd been absolute mayhem in Dublin the night before!
